about_the_game:
Be a part of the greatest adventure you will ever take! In this first person survival game you will be challenged to build a base and defend it against other players. Attack other players for a chance to steal some of their loot or venture towards AI controlled monuments to obtain your own loot. Need some help? Invite friends to help you make base improvements or to defend/attack other players.

Load into a new world with a blank slate. Gather resources to help you build and make improvements to your base. Monuments hold greater loot that can be used to build more advanced weapons or make improvements on existing ones.

This includes the base game which allows you to play online either by yourself or with friends. You can also choose to find a match which allows you to connect with a random player/team and fight for the loot available in the world.

Build bases.
Defend against other players and AI.
Build better weapons than your enemy to gain the advantage.
Attack other players bases to steal their hard earned loot.
Build intricately designed structures and defenses to help you during your base defenses.
Explore monuments for a chance to find loot and battle AI defenders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8+
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 2060 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10+
  • Processor: Intel i7+
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 2060 or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
